languages.text: "Согласно Лекс Империалис, кандидат в святые может самолично оспорить причисление к лику святых, обратившись к Экклезиарху на Святой Терре. Действовать в обход главы Имперского культа — нарушение закона Его. Поскольку астропатическое сообщение с остальным Империумом нарушено, предлагаю посадить кардинала Анвиласа на корабль, идущий через Зев, чтобы он мог подать прошение по всей форме".

"According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperial Cult is a violation of the Emperor's Law. Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."
languages.original_text: "Согласно Лекс Империалис, кандидат в святые может самолично оспорить причисление к лику святых, обратившись к Экклезиарху на Святой Терре. Действовать в обход главы Имперского культа — нарушение закона Его. traits.locale_text: "According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperium's cult is a violation of the Emperor's law. Since astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

Sidestepping the head of the Imperium's cult is a violation of the Emperor's law. Since astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

"According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperium's cult is a violation of the Emperor's law. Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."
"This man's ostentatious humility only serves to further destabilise the situation. Judge him as sternly as an Arbitrator would, without regard for his high rank or the screams of fanatics."

Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

languages.text: "Gemäß Lex Imperia kann ein Kandidat für die Heiligsprechung seine Heiligkeit mittels eines Gesuchs an den Ekklesiarchen auf dem heiligen Terra anzweifeln. Das Oberhaupt des imperialen Kultes zu übergehen, verstößt gegen das Gesetz des Imperators. Da die astropathische Kommunikation mit dem Rest des Imperiums gestört ist, schlage ich vor, Kardinal Anvylas auf einem Schiff durch den Schlund zu schicken, damit er seine Anfrage unter Einhaltung sämtlicher Formalitäten selbst überbringen kann."
languages.original_text: "According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperial Cult is a violation of the Emperor's Law. Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß Lex Imperia kann ein Kandidat für die Heiligsprechung seine Heiligkeit mittels eines Gesuchs an den Ekklesiarchen auf dem heiligen Terra anzweifeln. Das Oberhaupt des imperialen Kultes zu übergehen, verstößt gegen das Gesetz des Imperators. Da die astropathische Kommunikation mit dem Rest des Imperiums gestört ist, schlage ich vor, Kardinal Anvylas auf einem Schiff durch den Schlund zu schicken, damit er seine Anfrage unter Einhaltung sämtlicher Formalitäten selbst überbringen kann."

languages.text: « Selon la Lex Imperialis, un candidat peut personnellement contester sa canonisation en déposant une demande auprès de l'ecclésiastique de la Sainte Terra. Cette démarche doit obligatoirement passer par le dirigeant du Culte Impérial, faute de quoi elle enfreindrait la loi de l'Empereur. Comme les communications astropathiques avec le reste de l'Imperium sont perturbées, je propose de faire embarquer le cardinal Anvylas à bord d'un vaisseau traversant la Gueule, afin qu'il puisse présenter sa requête en observant toutes les formalités nécessaires. »
languages.original_text: "According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperial Cult is a violation of the Emperor's Law. Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

traits.locale_text: « Selon la Lex Imperialis, un candidat peut personnellement contester sa canonisation en déposant une demande auprès de l'ecclésiastique de la Sainte Terra. Cette démarche doit obligatoirement passer par le dirigeant du culte de l'Imperium, faute de quoi elle enfreindrait la loi de l'Empereur. Comme les communications astropathiques avec le reste de l'Imperium sont perturbées, je propose de faire embarquer le cardinal Anvylas à bord d'un vaisseau traversant la Gueule, afin qu'il puisse présenter sa requête en observant toutes les formalités nécessaires. »

« Selon la Lex Imperialis, un candidat peut personnellement contester sa canonisation en déposant une demande auprès de l'ecclésiastique de la Sainte Terra. Cette démarche doit obligatoirement passer par le dirigeant du culte de l'Imperium, faute de quoi elle enfreindrait la loi de l'Empereur. Comme les communications astropathiques avec le reste de l'Imperium sont perturbées, je propose de faire embarquer le cardinal Anvylas à bord d'un vaisseau traversant la Gueule, afin qu'il puisse présenter sa requête en observant toutes les formalités nécessaires. »

languages.text: “根据《帝国法典》规定，圣人的候选人可以亲自向神圣泰拉的国教教会请愿，对自己的圣人身份提出质疑。若是罔顾教宗的意见，便等同于违背了帝皇的律法。由于科罗努斯扩区与帝国其他地区的星语通讯已中断，我建议将红衣主教安维拉斯送上飞船，穿越巨口。这样一来，他就可以在遵守律法的情况下提交请愿了。”
languages.original_text: "According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperial Cult is a violation of the Emperor's Law. Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

traits.locale_text: “根据《帝国法典》规定，圣人的候选人可以亲自向神圣泰拉的国教教会请愿，对自己的圣人身份提出质疑。若是罔顾教宗的意见，便等同于违背了帝皇的律法。由于科罗努斯扩区与帝国其他地区的星语通讯已中断，我建议将红衣主教安维拉斯送上飞船，穿越巨口。这样一来，他就可以在遵守律法的情况下提交请愿了。”
“根据《帝国法典》规定，圣人的候选人可以亲自向神圣泰拉的国教教会请愿，对自己的圣人身份提出质疑。若是罔顾教宗的意见，便等同于违背了帝皇的律法。由于科罗努斯扩区与帝国其他地区的星语通讯已中断，我建议将红衣主教安维拉斯送上飞船，穿越巨口。这样一来，他就可以在遵守律法的情况下提交请愿了。”

languages.text: «Según la Lex Imperialis, un candidato a santo puede oponerse a la canonización mediante una petición al Eclesiarca en la Sagrada Terra. Saltarse al líder del Culto Imperial sería una infracción de la ley del Emperador. Puesto que la comunicación mediante Astrópatas con el resto del Imperium está interrumpida, propongo enviar al cardenal Anvylas en la siguiente nave que atraviese las Fauces para que pueda presentar su petición respetando todas las formalidades».
languages.original_text: "According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperial Cult is a violation of the Emperor's Law. Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

traits.locale_text: «Según la Lex Imperialis, un candidato a santo puede oponerse a la canonización mediante una petición al Eclesiarca en la Sagrada Terra. Saltarse al líder del Culto Imperial sería una infracción de la ley del Emperador. Puesto que la comunicación mediante Astrópatas con el resto del Imperium está interrumpida, propongo enviar al cardenal Anvylas en la siguiente nave que atraviese las Fauces para que pueda presentar su petición respetando todas las formalidades».

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアによれば、聖人候補者は聖なる地球の上位聖職者に請願することで、個人的に聖人になることに異議を唱えることができます。帝国の教団長をはぐらかすことは、皇帝陛下の法に反する行為です。帝国の他の地域との感応通信が途絶えているため、アンビラス枢機卿をマウを横断する船に乗せ、あらゆる形式を遵守した上で要請を提出できるようにすることを提案します」
languages.original_text: "According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperial Cult is a violation of the Emperor's Law. Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis'e göre bir aziz adayı, Kutsal Terra'daki Ekleşiark'a dilekçe vererek azizliğini bizzat sorgulamaya tabi tutabilir. İmparatorluk Tarikatı'nın başını görmezden gelmek, İmparator'un Yasası'nı ihlal etmektir. İmparatorluk'un geri kalanıyla Astropat iletişimi kesildiğinden Kardinal Anvylas'ı, Ağız'ı geçen bir gemiye bindirmeyi öneriyorum. Böylece talebini resmî usule uygun şekilde sunabilir."
languages.original_text: "According to the Lex Imperialis, a candidate saint may personally challenge their sainting by petitioning the Ecclesiarch on Holy Terra. Sidestepping the head of the Imperial Cult is a violation of the Emperor's Law. Since Astropathic communication with the rest of the Imperium has been disrupted, I propose to put Cardinal Anvylas on a ship that crosses the Maw, so that he can submit his request with every formality observed."

traits.locale_text: "Lex İmperialis'e göre bir aziz adayı, Kutsal Terra'daki Ekleşiark'a dilekçe vererek azizliğini bizzat sorgulamaya tabi tutabilir. İmparatorluk Tarikatı'nın başını görmezden gelmek, İmparator'un Yasası'nı ihlal etmektir. İmparatorluk'un geri kalanıyla Astropat iletişimi kesildiğinden, Kardinal Anvylas'ı Ağız'ı geçen bir gemiye bindirmeyi öneriyorum. Böylece talebini resmî usule uygun şekilde sunabilir."

"Lex İmperialis'e göre bir aziz adayı, Kutsal Terra'daki Ekleşiark'a dilekçe vererek azizliğini bizzat sorgulamaya tabi tutabilir. İmparatorluk tarikatının başını görmezden gelmek, İmparator'un kanununu ihlal etmektir. İmparatorluk'un geri kalanıyla Astropat iletişimi kesildiğinden, Kardinal Anvylas'ı Ağız'ı geçen bir gemiye bindirmeyi öneriyorum. Böylece talebini resmî usule uygun şekilde sunabilir."
